title: Champion Concept: Kaolin - The Forgotten Creation
body:
I imagine Kaolin as a mage support that uses animated clay as a resource.

Abilities:

**Passive:** - Animated Clay

Kaolin generates 10 animated clay every second, up to a maximum of 300. When Kaolin has 300 animated clay, the next ability will be empowered.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**Q** - Compressing Hug
Range: 125
Cost : 60 clay

Kaolin grabs an enemy target, dealing 30/60/90/120/150 (+30% AD) physical damaged and reduces the target's armour by 5/10/15/20/25% for 4 seconds.

_Empowered Hug:_ Armour reduction is increased by 15%
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**W** - Clay Spire
Range: 900
Cost: 80 clay

Kaolin creates a spire that drops on a target location, dealing 60/100/140/180/220 (+30% AP) magic damage to all units hit.

_Empowered Spire:_ On collision, the spire shatters and deals 20/60/100/140/180 (+30 AP) magic damage to all units in a small area.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**E** - Thick Slurry
Range: 1000
Cost: 50 clay

Kaolin throws a lump of clay in a chosen direction, dealing 40/80/120/160/200 (+30% AP) magic damage and slows the hit  target by 15/20/25/30/35% for 5 seconds.

_Empowered Slurry:_ The hit target is slowed by an additional 15%
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

**R** - Mullite Shield
Range: 950
Cost: 100 clay

Kaolin grants an allied champion an earthen shield that absorbs 250/400/550 (+40% AP) incoming damage for the next 10 seconds.

_Empowered Shield:_ The shield's strength is increased by 50%

replies.body:
Kinda cool. Ich mag est. Maybe increase clay generation as Kaolin goes up in levels and decrease the cap on the empowered abilities.

_Q_
So basically point and click damage that decreases armor. Personally, I think armor decrease is a boring benefit. Maybe the ability could have a few more mechanics to it? Dealing more damage the more armor they have or add some weak CC. But if they are a mage support, why do they have a melee point and click damage that breaks armor?

_W_
Oh god the range. With infinite mana, this would be a pain in the ass poke. IMO, the super high longe range manaless poke is just crazy. Maybe make it a bit more mechanical than damage.

_E_
This is a pretty weak considering they are a support mage. The only makeup for it is that it is 5 seconds, which is a really long time to be slowed.

_R_
IMO, this would never be used on anyone it's built for. Imagine Nasus getting this.

Sorry for late reply, been out for a couple of days. But thankyou for input.


Great point about the Q, any suggestion as to ratios or damage based on armour/MR? I'm not good at numbers.

With the W, do you mean like a brief delay and a shorter range? Maybe a higher cost as well?

I understand the E is weak, but it becomes stronger with full animated clay. Is 50% max slow to little? Again, I'm not so good at numbers.

Any suggestions for an alternate R? 

Thanks again for your input and quick response. Any other suggestions?
